overview:
Justin builds businesses by spotting opportunities, envisioning solutions and aggressively implementing sales and marketing campaigns to grow revenues.

Justin Williams is nunovo’s Co-founder and President. In this role Justin oversees Marketing and Sales related activities, including: acquiring strategic to-market partners, leading account development / management and coordinating branding initiatives.

Justin has a background in Business Development in numerous roles. In his most recent corporate experience Justin participated as an Account Development Executive for OtterBox. Justin managed a national account base of mobile retailers helping to grow department revenues over 8 times in a 2 year period. Justin was recognized as a ‘Flying Otter’, an award recognizing the top 10% of performers across departments. Included in his experience with OtterBox, Justin participated as the Sales Department’s Subject Matter Expert in implementing CRM into Business Operations.
